comments.author: Mr. Goldman

comments.text:
+Mr. Goldman Thank you for clearing that up - I just thought you were 
incredibly obtuse.  I've run into people online where the line between 
troll and genuinely out-of-touch is a fine one, at best.  Bravo - you had 
me played.
comments.author: Sierra Whiskey

comments.text:
The pig died, and due to reincarnation he returned to the exact moment he 
originally spawned, similarly to how non-violent mobs in Minecraft will 
respawn at the same location if killed.  Or he is in Piggy heaven, where it 
is always day and there is no night full of terrors.  And if neither of 
those are to your satisfaction, remember - IT'S JUST A SILLY VIDEO!
comments.author: Sierra Whiskey
